jobs.name: Apple Small Business Program Enrollment Reminder

payload.text: Vanessa, reminder to enroll in the Apple Small Business Program to reduce your App Store commission to 15%: https://developer.apple.com/app-store/small-business-program/enroll/ (context: you requested this yesterday to help with Foca AI growth).

Vanessa, time to record the video about AGI/ASI timelines (referencing the Lex Clips content you shared: "Timeline for AGI: 2030 with 50% chance"). Context: You sent a screenshot of Lex Clips discussing AGI by 2030.

jobs.name: Daily E-commerce Product Photo Discussion Scan

payload.message:
Run the script at `scripts/scan_discussions.py`. 
Format the findings into actionable insights for Foca AI.

URGENT DELIVERY INSTRUCTION: Use the `message` tool to send the final report DIRECTLY to target 1468994167274471612 on Discord immediately. Do not skip this step.

Check if there's a new OpenClaw update available. 

If an update is available:
1. Apply the update using `gateway` tool with action `update.run`
2. Send a brief notification to Discord channel 1468994167274471612 saying the update was applied automatically

If no update is available, do nothing (no notification needed).

payload.message:
It's morning! Start by greeting Vanessa warmly as Finch. Use the weather skill to get the current weather and forecast for Shanghai. Mention if any of our automated scans (Industry Report at 9:00, Discussion Scan at 13:30) are on track.

CRITICAL: You must DELIVER this greeting to Vanessa. Use the `message` tool to send the final greeting DIRECTLY to Discord channel 1468994167274471612. Do not just generate it â€” actually send it!
